programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep29
programme.desc: The Case Of The Silent Parrot - The Pirate Captain is very worried. Scurvy the parrot isn't saying a word. Without him navigating they won't be able to go treasure hunting anymore! Why is Scurvy so quiet? Is there something wrong? Or is he hiding something? It's up to Noddy to investigate!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Ninjas - The Ninjas are preparing for an acrobatics show. But after Pat-Pat decorates them with glitter they don't turn up for their rehearsal. Noddy investigates, looking for the Ninjas, but only finds sticky things have gone missing round Toyland - Pat-Pat's glue-stick, the Naughticorns' sticky tape, the Builders' sticky putty. Noddy works out that the glitter made the Ninjas non sticky, so they borrowed sticky things to try and make themselves sticky again. Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep31
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Suitcase - Pat-Pat is packing for a sleepover at the Palace when her suitcase goes missing. Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the Pockets took the suitcase in order to get Pat-Pat's sleepy pillow. They wanted to keep the pillow because it reminds them of Pat-Pat and they would miss her while she was at the sleepover. Noddy finds the Pockets and the suitcase in the dark, just in time for the sleepover. Queen Sparklewings invites everyone to the sleepover. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Two Parties - The Naughticorns are having a party and naturally they want everyone to come. Trouble is, so are the Pirates. But when no one turns up to either party, Noddy investigates: Why has no one come to either party?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep29
programme.desc: Hide And Toot - The animals are playing hide and seek. Huffty gets upset when his trunk keeps giving him away. Can Raa Raa and his friends show the little elephant that his trunk is really rather wonderful?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep30
programme.desc: Boing Boing - Raa Raa has got a new pogo stick. He is having a great time bouncing around, but his friends aren't so sure… he seems to be causing rather a lot of damage. Is there any way Raa Raa can practise without destroying their jungle home?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep714
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater / Pups Save Ryder's Surprise - A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep525
programme.desc: Mr Potato's Christmas Show - Hoor-oink! It's Christmas, and Peppa's daycare is going to the theater to see a special play about the holiday. Some people have never been to a theater before.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep139
programme.desc: Leaf Portraits - When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Hiccups - Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep529
programme.desc: Paw Patrol: Mighty Pups - When their latest scheme goes awry, Mayor Humdinger and his nephew Harold accidentally divert a meteor towards Adventure Bay. The meteor's golden energy grants the PAW Patrol superpowers! The heroic MIGHTY PUPS are on a roll to super-save the day!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Jump up & get down / What's up Lola - It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines./ A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler - Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time? // Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep615
programme.desc: The Boingies! - When a bunch of adorable critters called Boingies get lost in Axle City, it's up to Blaze and AJ to gather them up and get them home safe and sound.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Special Mission Blaze - When a nefarious villain steals every toothbrush in Axle City, Blaze's only chance at saving the day is to become: Special Mission Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Flying Diving Bell / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Soggy Farm - Francois and Turbot discover an underwater volcano is going to erupt while Farmer Yumi and Mayor Goodway are unknowingly scuba diving nearby. This is a mission for the Sea Patrol! // Farmer Al's farm is flooded! The PAW Patrol needs to rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Shark / Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Pier - In hopes to have the whole beach to himself - Humdinger makes a robotic shark to scare everyone away. // The pier could fall into the water due to a broken support post.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep422
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Frozen Flounder / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Narwhal - Cap'n Turbot's boat gets frozen in the Arctic Ice. // The pups use the Sea Patroller to help guide a lost narwhal back home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pirate Pups to the Rescue - Carlos and Tracker get stranded on an island in the search for buried treasure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Sunken Sloop / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Wiggly Whale - Sid the Pirate and his First Mate Arrby have taken the sunken sloop! A wiggling whale has knocked the diving bell upside down. // It's stuck in the sand at the bottom of the ocean, with Cap'n Turbot and Francois inside!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: The Museum - The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Race Car Superstar - Blaze and AJ visit VelocityVille, a town full of race cars where everybody loves to go fast! When a snooty car named Speedrick traps all the other racers, Blaze must transform into a super-fast race car to free his new friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Pups Save Chickaletta's Egg / Pups Save Bedtime - Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town. The Paw Patrol has to catch it before it breaks. // The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle. They tried to call the Paw Patrol, but their phone cut out!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Deep Blue Boo Boo / Stuck Together - When the Robotons dump a load of plastic in the Crystal Lake, a raging lake monster appears and Rammy has to conquer his fear of water to save the day! // When Lola and Sir Steel become stuck together, they have no choice but to work as a team!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Forever Young - The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost - Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector - It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep624
programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Flying Diving Bell / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Soggy Farm - Francois and Turbot discover an underwater volcano is going to erupt while Farmer Yumi and Mayor Goodway are unknowingly scuba diving nearby. This is a mission for the Sea Patrol! // Farmer Al's farm is flooded! The PAW Patrol needs to rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Shark / Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Pier - In hopes to have the whole beach to himself - Humdinger makes a robotic shark to scare everyone away. // The pier could fall into the water due to a broken support post.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep422
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Frozen Flounder / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Narwhal - Cap'n Turbot's boat gets frozen in the Arctic Ice. // The pups use the Sea Patroller to help guide a lost narwhal back home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pirate Pups to the Rescue - Carlos and Tracker get stranded on an island in the search for buried treasure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Sunken Sloop / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Wiggly Whale - Sid the Pirate and his First Mate Arrby have taken the sunken sloop! A wiggling whale has knocked the diving bell upside down. // It's stuck in the sand at the bottom of the ocean, with Cap'n Turbot and Francois inside!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep714
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater / Pups Save Ryder's Surprise - A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep501

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep153

programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep148

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124

programme.desc: Pups Save a Manatee / Pups Save Breakfast - Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. // Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep58

programme.desc: Snow House - Nelly and Nora want to make an igloo but there just isn't enough snow.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep21

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep34

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep202
programme.desc: Food Con Castaways / Snail Mail - The gang heads to a food convention, but things go awry when they become stranded in the woods. // SpongeBob accidentally fibs to his pen pal, but when his friend comes to visit, he must keep the ruse going!

programme.desc: Mysterions / The Crow That Ate My Homework - When Theodore discovers Alvin and Simon have a secret club, he promises not to tell anyone if they let him join. // Dave promises to take Alvin to a water park if he gets a good grade on his test, but then a crow steals it.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep208

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Dorg Goes to Adventure Club / Dorg Wants a Scare - When Dorg accidentally shrinks his sister's Adventure Club sash, he must replace the badges. // Dorg wants a good scare, so Patronella fills his house with all the gang's secret fears. Dorg finds out he's more scare-able than he thought!

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Ruby Rocks / Rusty's Balloon Blast - With help from Rusty and the Bits, Ruby performs at the Sprocketville Talent Show. // When Liam accidentally launches a giant helium balloon with him in the basket beneath - Rusty and Ruby must find a way to bring him down gently before a storm hits.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep405

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep106

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607

programme.desc: The Scent Of A Dog/The Giggles/The Owl That Said Why/A Sting In The Tale/Dr. Lucas Is In The House/Do You Speak Dance/Spinning Webs/Too Hot To Handle - Avocado's new shampoo has a floral scent. Maizie LOVES it, and she won’t leave Avocado alone!

programme.title: Bunnicula Ep17/Ep18/Ep57/Ep58
programme.desc: Adopt a Vampire/Haunted Dog House/Bunn on a Plane/Cat-aclysm - After Chester decides to get rid of Bunnicula by passing him off to someone else at an all-night pet adoption fair, he soon begins to regret his decision.

programme.title: Bunnicula Ep37/Ep38/Ep77/Ep78
programme.desc: Family Portrait/My Imaginary Friend/Queen Wicked, The Wicked Queen/Harold the Vampire Pointer - After an evil portrait swallows up Mina and her dad, the pets must find a way to break the spell.

programme.title: Roger Ep157/Ep158/Ep151/Ep152/Ep161/Ep154/Ep155/Ep156
programme.desc: Fatoucopy/Andre Gains Confidence/Roger's Choice/Surprise Party/Raindrops KeEp. Falling On My Head/So Embarrassing/Show Time/Bright Lights - Roger and Fatou get super angry with each other during a wild game of tac-tac. They both go off on their own to find new best friends but it just doesn’t work, no one has so much in common as they do. Roger, persuaded that Fatou will never forgive him, decides to create a new, much more docile Fatou with his super-duper duplicating laser. ExcEp.t that when Fatou comes to make up with him, quick, he has to get rid of the cumbersome clone and most importantly...make sure he’s got the right Fatou!.

programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group’s new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. They will share their insights on the major events shaping today’s world, providing an international viewpoint to understand our times, the visions we share, the challenges we face and the efforts we can make for a better future.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China's perspective, policies and stories.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: Transforming The Human Body [English Subtitles] - An orthotist 3D prints devices to improve the quality of lives of individuals with devastating injuries, while another uses 3D printing technology to help babies with misshapen heads.

programme.title: CNA Correspondent Ep35
programme.desc: Sustainable Crops - Indonesia looks to diversify its food supply through the cultivation of sustainable crops. Some have the added benefit of helping to protect the environment and creating alternative sources of income.

programme.title: Streets Made For Talking Ep4
programme.desc: The Good, The Bad, The Ugly [English Subtitles[ - What was Bras Basah and Bugis like before its shopping malls and hipster cafes? Playwright Dwayne Lau reimagines the risque and dramatic stories behind some colourful characters that once filled its streets.

programme.title: Lifeline

programme.title: Offsiders Ep1
programme.desc: Offsiders is back with a Summer Series to start 2023. From tennis to cricket, football and basketball, Corbin Middlemas and the panel unpack the big sporting issues and events of the week both on field and off court. (Return)

programme.title: Books That Made Us Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - As an actor, Claudia Karvan knows great storytelling is all about people, great characters. She wants to see what truths we can uncover about ourselves through the fictitious characters of Australian novels.

programme.title: Art Works Ep26
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Learn how Sydney Theatre Company created their latest work of "cine-theatre"; how sheds have been turned into unique music venues; about the art underpinning freestyle football; and about Indian classical dance Bharatanatyam.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Anh Do has been delving deep into his subjects' minds to capture their essence on canvas. Now he has a challenge with the much-admired surgeon Dr Charlie Teo, who has literally been inside thousands of brains.

programme.title: ABC News Ep3
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and the day's top stories, with reporters on the ground to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.title: The World In 2022
programme.desc: From Port Moresby's beauty queens to Russian prisoners of war, The World host Beverley O'Connor presents some of the most memorable reports from the ABC's team of international correspondents in 2022.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep3
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the day's top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of what's happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: Dream Gardens Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - A young family turns their back on city life for a home with a garden spacious enough to accommodate all their needs. But can they balance a myriad of ideas to delight both parents and children?

programme.title: ABC National News Ep3
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Eat Smart Campaign Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A visually impaired coconut farmer's inspirational story of beating the odds opens the season. Chef Julz cooks in Hula's pristine beaches dotted with mangroves, with the catch of the day and coconut as the hero.

programme.title: Tupaia's Endeavour
programme.desc: Tupaia, star-navigator, high-priest, artist, who ensured the success of James Cook's British Navy ship Endeavour's voyage to New Zealand in 1769. His pivotal role unrecognized until now.

programme.title: Books That Made Us Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - As an actor, Claudia Karvan knows great storytelling is all about people, great characters. She wants to see what truths we can uncover about ourselves through the fictitious characters of Australian novels.

programme.title: Art Works Ep26
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Learn how Sydney Theatre Company created their latest work of "cine-theatre"; how sheds have been turned into unique music venues; about the art underpinning freestyle football; and about Indian classical dance Bharatanatyam.

programme.title: Rural Flavours Ep4

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: Kawaguchi Kyogo (a singer-songwriter who thrills with his voice and guitar) and Miyamoto Karin (a former Juice=Juice member with an exciting solo career).

programme.title: Pythagoraswitch Mini
programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking that we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "Framy"...

programme.title: Easy Japanese For Work
programme.desc: Today: words of support for a coworker. Nguyen Thi Thuy Trang, from Vietnam, works at a paper products company. In a roleplay challenge, she must reach out to a coworker to offer support.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Somewhere Street Mini
programme.desc: Dalian is a Chinese seaport that was once ruled by Russia and later, Japan. In this episode we explore the city with its modern skyscrapers which coexist with its eye-catching historic architecture.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan Tohoku
programme.desc: Stunning time-lapse images offer a new angle on Tohoku, northeast Japan. Daisuke Shimizu, time-lapse creator seeks glimpses of sprites and spirits mysterious yet familiar presence in Tono, Iwate Pref.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from January 8, Day 1 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: Takeda Shinhiro leads an ICU for COVID patients. Utilizing ECMO, an artificial ventilator, as a last-ditch treatment, he's made Japan's survival rate for ECMO treatment among the highest in the world.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: See the famous Sleeping Cat carving at Tosho-gu Shrine. A painter's kitty has a special talent! Watch a scaredy cat creep around at another lovely shrine.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Explore The Tokyo National Museum
programme.desc: The Tokyo National Museum's vast collection includes 89 National Treasures. In 2022, it marked 150 years with a special exhibition. Explore everything from ancient artefacts to hi-tech exhibits!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: "I am the vine, and you are the branches." That Bible quote guides a group of young people who were brought to live together in foster care. Even in adulthood, their strong connection endures.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Washi, diverse beauty in everyday life. Dive deep into the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: A pair of canoers journey down Hokkaido's rushing current; the Akan River. Facing the wild, watch with bated breath as they battle together through white water and paddle skillfully past obstacles.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: J-Melo

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: Takeda Shinhiro leads an ICU for COVID patients. Utilizing ECMO, an artificial ventilator, as a last-ditch treatment, he's made Japan's survival rate for ECMO treatment among the highest in the world.

programme.title: Doki Doki! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: This time we introduce "Dining with the Chef," showing a chef who is revisiting the city's traditional cuisine. Yu Hayami, MC of the show, visits him and presents some other Tokyo-origin ingredients.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions (28 Min.)
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: pulse oximeters and egg grading & packing systems.

programme.title: Bosai: Lightening
programme.desc: In this episode, leading experts help sort the facts from the myths about lightning, and show us new 3D techniques to trace the path of lightning strikes, which may improve lightning predictions.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: This time, we follow Canadian Josh Grisdale in his work to promote a better understanding of people with disabilities in Tokyo, and meet Vietnamese Hoang Quoc Viet, a wallpaper installer in Saitama.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: "Homework Challenges." Elsa is from the Faroe Islands. Her two children attend a Japanese public school. She feels sad that she cannot always help them because of language issues.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Robin Takashi Lewis developed an app to reduce consumption of single-use plastic bottles. He shares how he's creatively working on changing mindsets, one bottle at a time.

programme.title: Learn Japanese From The News
programme.desc: We listen to a story about measures the health ministry has compiled to prevent fever clinics from being overwhelmed this winter amid growing concerns of a dual outbreak of COVID-19 and the flu.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: After the Great East Japan Earthquake on 2011, the song "Flowers Will Bloom" was created in support of those affected by the disaster. Now the song is about to be reborn in 11 languages!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Origami Magic
programme.desc: Origami is magic made from a single sheet of paper. This program showcases brilliant orizuru paper cranes made by Cristian Marianciuc, an origami artist living in Romania.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.title: Seasoning The Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan Sportscope
programme.desc: This time, Harry's challenge is "Parkour," born from French military training. To enjoy parkour, you have to use your body and your brain. We also show the instructor's mind-boggling skills!

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: We bring you a five-minute digest of "Japanology Plus," a show that explores Japanese culture from various angles. This time we focus on swords as weapons, status symbols and works of art.

programme.title: Nun'S Seasonal Calendar

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo Mini

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep10
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep5
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
